messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] ned
messages.msgSnippet: ... Get into the Yahoo groups section on the yahoo website. Click on or find Unschooling-dotcom, since you ARE a member. ;-) Go into Messages. In the upper
messages.messageBody:
> > Ned's first post was message #38139.
> >
>
>
> Okay you all...I'm not that good yet. How would I find it?
> Also, does anyone remember his screen name and the web site that he has.
>
> Kim



Get into the Yahoo groups section on the yahoo website.
Click on or find Unschooling-dotcom, since you ARE a member. ;-)
Go into Messages.
In the upper right section, there is a little box that you can input a
message # to go to.
Enter in #38139, press "go".
It should take you right there.
Ned (and Luz) went by the screen name Ned Vare and Luz Shozie.
His website is http://www.borntoexplore.org

Karin

messages.messageBody:
Can someone point me to Ned's posts in the archives?

He reminds me of someone. I"d like to see what he was posting about.

Kristen


****************************************************************

Today is even more important than tomorrow because "today" is a gift, and "tomorrow" might never come.

Today is where hope lives because today is when we can make things better than yesterday.

The only thing we can be sure of is today and life isn't worth living if it isn't lived in joy for as many moments of today as we can manage.
